TextView.android:text:
1. Welcome to FilmStack help guide .
2. FilmStack is a movie recommendation application that works upon a special algorithm .
3.If you have liked/watched a movie do click on SEEN button so the algorithm can works better .
4.You can also like a actor/actress if u like bcz it also plays a great role in algorithm function .
5.This app lets you watch movies and also download them .
6. You can bookmark a page for offline reading .
7.You can set reminder to watch a movie later .
8 Thanks for choosing FilmStack .!!!
